__e: There are some paths woven so deeply into the fabric of the world, Merlin, that nothing can be done to change them.
It appears, Merlin, on this single, solitary occasion... ..you may be right.
Merlin,what are you doing here,trading in your crime scene kit for a magic kit?
I don't care what Merlin said.
Merlin was right - he could have killed me but instead he thought it was more important to give me this, and he gave his life in doing so.
Belle, what Merlin said about a man that can control dark for good...
